issue.title: www.facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com) ### Comment > The AdGuard app for Android is not blocking ads in the Facebook app anymore. Ads are getting through on videos, no matter what I update. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/yq2xof5.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | Android 11 AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v3.6.11 (54) Browser: | Facebook App AdGuard mode: | VPN Filtering quality: | High-quality HTTPS filtering: | enabled Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Block third-party Authorization header,
Self-destructing first-party cookies (1440),
Self-destructing third-party cookies (0),
Disable cache for third-party requests,
Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (www.google.com),
Hide your User-Agent (Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; U; Android 11.0) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/11.0 Mobile Safari/533.1),
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184) DNS filtering: | server: `AdGuard DNS`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter, AdAway Default Blocklist, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, The NoTracking blocklist, OISD Blocklist Full, Steven Black's List, Phishing URL Blocklist (PhishTank and OpenPhish), Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List, NoCoin Filter List, Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin, Stalkerware Indicators List, The Big List of Hacked Malware Web Sites, Malicious URL Blocklist (URLHaus), WindowsSpyBlocker – Hosts spy rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/142914#issuecomment-1433839152
The issue is cause by `Fanboy's Annoyances` and `EasyList Cookie List`, please add to your user rules: 
```
beta.character.ai#@#.modal
beta.character.ai#@#.modal-backdrop
```

Or turn off `Fanboy's Annoyances` and `EasyList Cookie List`.
